title: Man taken to hospital after self-inflicted shooting at Odell Weeks
content:
A shooting was reported at the H. Odell Weeks Activities Center in Aiken on Friday around 5 p.m., according to police dispatch.
An Aiken Department of Public Safety officer at the scene of the shooting said a 68-year-old white male was taken to the hospital with a self-inflicted gunshot wound. The man was found by police outside of the Weeks Center in Virginia Acres Park, the officer said.
The shooting was reported around 5 p.m., as the first day of the annual Christmas Craft Show was coming to a close.
The annual two-day craft show consisting of more than 150 vendors attracts thousands of residents each year. The Weeks Center is at 1700 Whiskey Road.
